title.narrative: Rajasthan State Highway Investment Program - Tranche 1

description.narrative: The project proposed for financing under the requested PFR includes two components: (i) State highway improvement: about 1,000 km of the state highway and major district roads in Rajasthan will be improved to 2-lane or intermediate-lane standard and to meet the road safety requirements. (ii) Capacity development of Rajasthan PWD: The component will build the capacity of PPP Division, Rajasthan PWD on the business process covering road asset management, road safety, and project management. A project performance monitoring system will also be developed for management the PPP projects.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Efficiency and safety of transport on the state highways of Rajasthan improved

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Life cycle road safety audit implemented on all project roads.
